name: HoloFuel
description: Simple and intuitive interface allowing users to transact with HoloFuel.

scripts.start-dna-agent2: cd ./holofuel && HC_N3H_BOOTSTRAP_NODE=wss://192.168.0.7:46731/?a=hkYaC5mTk7aEMxCiooK1i3ePohoLDhLyDKYda8cWV-KDEvdD6f62JXS1-cLnOm3aK3gObMx-0U7hw0VKMXIIvgQjKmVi0_ru HC_N3H_IPC_URI=wss://127.0.0.1:33993/ HC_N3H_PATH=/home/lisa/n3h HC_AGENT=testAgent2 hc run --port 3100
